reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be a beautiful high-quality ski piece that is warm and comfortable, with one customer noting they can wear it indoors without sweating. They appreciate its appearance, with one mentioning it's chic enough for après-ski events, and consider it good value for money. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect while others say it runs a bit snug for medium sizes.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome
items.body: Want a Norwegian sweater but can’t afford the airfare? Buy this. Well made, genuine product, looks great, comfortable, and great price. Only thing you miss is seeing the fjords and paying off the credit card bill. Read more
items.author: Twit42

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure Perfection!
items.body: I've wanted a Dale of Norway sweater for years and years, and finally took the plunge since this one was on sale. Yes, they are expensive, but the craftsmanship is second to none. As soon as you hold the product in your hands, you know you have something special - and that's exactly how you feel when you wear it. The fit is flattering, and I feel like a million bucks when I'm wearing it. The wool is super soft, warm, and breathable enough so that you can wear it indoors without sweating, which is a big deal when you're my age. It's not scratchy like some wool sweaters can be, so you'd be fine with just wearing a camisole underneath. The only trouble is . . .now I want another one. I'm addicted! Read more
items.author: Audrey A. Rice

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, but fit a little snug for a medium
items.body: I loved this when I received it as the quality and feel is outstanding. However, it was a little too short and fitted around the mid-section on me. I ordered a medium, which is typically what I wear from about any brand or store (I'm also 5'7" and have a smaller top and wider hips). I returned it since for the price I want it to fit comfortably! Read more
items.author: Blair Voigt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality!
items.body: I love these sweaters but unfortunately the large was too big for my daughter so I am returning. She normally wears a large. Read more
items.author: Cj

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome
items.body: Wife loves it, worth the big money. Quality item Read more
items.author: Dg

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars size
items.body: Ordered this Dale of Norway sweater in medium, too small sent it back, ordered it in large, came the same size as the one I sent back????? Read more
items.author: Richard G Hanson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Art Should Be Worn!
items.body: This sweater is a veritable work of hand made art much like any Dale of Norway sweater. Fit is perfect and flattering. Exceedingly well made. Durable enough for wearing while down hill or cross country skiing. Chic enough for après ski in the lounge Read more
items.author: M. Bazarek

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful high-quality ski sweater!
items.body: Beautiful high-quality ski sweater! Purchased a medium and fit perfectly Read more
items.author: Mollie D.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sand Offwhite Blueshadow, Pinegreen Offwhite Springgreen, Black White Darkcharcoal, Navy Bronze Beige Offwhite, Raspberry/Allium/Black/Off White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
